name: Magently
description:
We are Magently, a team of certified Magento developers. We've done multiple projects and have become strong, business-oriented experts and Magento contributors.
We create Magento-based stores, modules and custom extensions. We have experience working with a variety of business models. Everything in line with the best UI & UX standards.
Contact us for a preliminary consultation or get a quote for your project. Visit Magently.com for more info
